name: Stripe Terminal Backend
description: Production-ready backend for Stripe Terminal SDK. https://stripe.com/docs/terminal

ENVIRONMENT.description: Set to 'production' for production deployment, or leave empty for test mode

STRIPE_ENV.description: Stripe environment: 'production' for live mode, 'test' for test mode

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Your Stripe LIVE secret key (starts with sk_live_...). Required for production. Find it at https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys

STRIPE_TEST_SECRET_KEY.description: Your Stripe TEST secret key (starts with sk_test_...). Used when STRIPE_ENV=test. Find it at https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys
